## CdkSelectableContainerDirective class

Add to a element to make it a container component for selectable components that inherits from the [CdkSelectableItemBaseComponent](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CdkSelectableContainerDirective 
```

## Constructors

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(presenter)](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>CdkSelectableContainerDirective</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [getSelectedIds](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.getselectedids.md) |  | () =&gt; (string \| number)\[\] | Get an array of the currently selected ids |
|  [resetSelections](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.resetselections.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Set the selected status of all items to false. |
|  [selectionChanged](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.selectionchanged.md) |  | EventEmitter&lt;(string \| number)\[\]&gt; | Emits an array of currently selected ids when an item in the container changes its selected status. |
